# CGM Shiny

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

cgmshiny is an R Shiny application for analyzing Continuous Glucose Monitor data. Primarily intended for use in research studies and dietary interventions.

## Installation

You can install the released version of cgmshiny from [Github](https://github.com/) with:

```{r} 
devtools::install_github('rolandhangelbroek/cgmshiny')
```
